# r-heading



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                         | Type                                                                                                            | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | The heading color (Ionic color)     | `"danger" \| "dark" \| "light" \| "medium" \| "primary" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "tertiary" \| "warning"` | `undefined` |
| `level`  | `level`   | The heading level (1-6, default: 2) | `number`                                                                                                        | `2`         |
| `text`   | `text`    | The heading text                    | `string`                                                                                                        | `undefined` |
